main.name: Tyson Wright
main.occupation: Data Analytics and Information Technology Graduate
main.description: Searching for a role in Data Analytics, Web Development and Software Engineering

about.aboutLine: My name is Tyson Wright, I enjoy using data and programming skills to discover new insights and solve interesting problems.

work.title: Team Member
description: Torquay Warehouse Team Member of the Year 2019.
Provided excellent customer service promptly and courteously and used creative problem solving to ensure customers got the information they needed.

work.title: Front-end Web Developer Intern
description: Responsible for making the codelearn.io site responsive for mobile and tablet devices.
Technologies used: C#, .NET, JavaScript, Git, Bootstrap, Chart.js, CSS & HTML.

work.title: Website Development & Maintenance
description: Implemented the Jan Juc Cricket Club website and online store.
Responsible for maintaining the website, hosting, PayPal and e-commerce.
Technologies used: WordPress, WooCommerce, PayPal API

projects.title: Plant Catalogue
projects.description: Uses the trefle.io API to display and search through plants by common name, scientific name, genus and family. Shows helpful information about varying growing conditions for each plant. PWA optimized with efficient caching policy and installable from the browser.

projects.title: AWS Cloud Services
projects.description: As part of my Cloud Systems class, I was tasked with creating a C# application that would communicate with multiple WCF services hosted on AWS. The cloud solution I created consisted of 3 algorithms each running on 3 different EC2 instances. I then created a load balancer so that each time the project was initiated, the calculations ran on 1 VM for each algorithm.

projects.title: Jan Juc Cricket Club Store
projects.description: Implemented a simple, easy-to-use e-commerce solution for the Jan Juc Cricket club. The site is used to collect membership payments and sell club merchandise. Handles over $5,000 in sales annually.
projects.technology: WordPress, WooCommerce, PayPal and various plug-ins

projects.title: Time is Money - Chrome Extension
projects.description: A chrome extension that converts monetary amounts displayed on websites into the equivalent hours you'd need to work based on your hourly pay rate.

projects.title: Capstone Application Portal
projects.description: For my university capstone project I was the Back-End leader for the Capstone Application Portal project. We were tasked by the client to make a number of visual and functional changes to an existing job-board website that did not meet the business requirements.
